programme.title: The Day After
programme.short_synopsis: The first screening of The Day After, and the response of the television audience.
programme.medium_synopsis: The Day After, a television movie depicting the effect of a nuclear attack on Kansas City, and the anticipation of and reaction to the first screening of it in November 1983.
